summary.span: 使用 命名空间包含的类可以编写自己的事务应用程序和资源管理器。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that allow you to write your own transactional application and resource manager.

summary.span: 具体地说，可以创建和参与（与一个或多个参与者）本地或分布式事务。

span.span: Specifically, you can create and participate in a transaction (local or distributed) with one or multiple participants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 你只能创建应用程序使用在 Windows 2000、 Windows XP 和 Windows 2003 平台下，此命名空间。You can only create applications using this namespace under the Windows 2000, Windows XP and Windows 2003 platforms. 创建在 Windows 98 和 Windows ME 平台引发事务。Creating a transaction under the Windows 98 and Windows ME platforms throws a . 基础结构通过使事务编程简单和高效整个平台支持 SQL Server、 ADO.NET、 MSMQ 和 Microsoft 分布式事务处理协调器 (MSDTC) 中启动的事务。The infrastructure makes transactional programming simple and efficient throughout the platform by supporting transactions initiated in SQL Server, ADO.NET, MSMQ, and the Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC). 它提供这两个显式编程模型基于类，以及隐式编程模型使用类，在其中事务自动管理基础结构。It provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. 强烈建议你将用于开发变得更容易隐式的模型。It is highly recommended that you use the easier implicit model for development. 若要开始，请参阅[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ddba95e-7587-48b2-8838-708c275e7199)主题。To get started, please see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ddba95e-7587-48b2-8838-708c275e7199) topic. 编写事务应用程序的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on writing a transactional application, see . 此外提供了为你实现资源管理器的类型。 also provides types for you to implement a resource manager. 事务管理器对本机基础结构允许易失性资源或无法提交或回滚高效的单个持久资源登记。The transaction manager native to the infrastructure allows volatile resources or a single durable resource enlistment to commit or roll back efficiently. 有关实现资源管理器的详细信息，请参阅[实现资源管理器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on implementing a resource manager, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 事务管理器还以透明方式将为分布式事务的本地事务升级通过其他持久资源管理器登记本身具有的事务时协调通过如 DTC，基于磁盘的事务管理器。The transaction manager also transparently escalates local transactions to distributed transactions by coordinating through a disk-based transaction manager like the DTC, when an additional durable resource manager enlists itself with a transaction. 基础结构提供增强性能的关键方式有两种。There are two key ways that the infrastructure provides enhanced performance. - 动态升级，这意味着基础结构仅啮合 MSDTC 事务实际需要时。Dynamic Escalation, which means that the infrastructure only engages the MSDTC when it is actually required for a transaction. 在中深入介绍了此区域[事务管理升级](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)主题。This area is covered in depth in the [Transaction Management Escalation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7) topic. - 可提升的登记，如果某个资源是参与事务的唯一实体，则允许该资源（如数据库）取得事务的所有权。Promotable Enlistments, which allows a resource, such as a database, to take ownership of the transaction if it is the only entity participating in the transaction. 稍后，如果需要基础结构仍然可以提升到 MSDTC 事务的管理。Later, if needed, the infrastructure can still escalate the management of the transaction to MSDTC. 这样进一步减少了使用 MSDTC 的机会。This further reduces the chance of using the MSDTC. 在中深入介绍了此区域[优化使用单阶段提交和可提升单个阶段通知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb)主题。This area is covered in depth in the [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb) topic. 定义限制它公开的资源类型的访问的三个级别的信任。 defines three levels of trust that restrict access on the types of
